DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To evaluate whether trimester specific d-dimer level brain natriuretic protein ( BNP ) , along modify Wells score ( MWS ) , useful risk stratification tool exclude pregnant woman low-risk pulmonary embolism ( PE ) diagnostic image radiation exposure .
DOC.brief_title: Pulmonary Embolism Pregnancy : Biomarkers Clinical Predictive Models

Pregnant woman underwent diagnostic imaging evaluate suspect PE institution prospectively enrol February 2014 August 2015 . Both d-dimer BNP serum level draw , MWS assign . All pregnant woman diagnose PE underwent diagnostic image d-dimer level drawn January 2009 June 2014 retrospectively enrol . Patient electronic record use apply MWS analyze risk .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : adult pregnant woman > = 18 year old ddimer obtain patient pregnant time PE diagnosis patient present Emergency Department Labor Delivery unit patient present sign symptom suspicious PE Exclusion criterion : nonpregnant patient patient < 18 year old
